meanings.definition: A person or thing that exhausts.
meanings.sent1: The exhauster of energy left us all tired.
meanings.sent2: The exhauster of patience finally caused a reaction.
meanings.sent3: The exhauster of jokes made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her exhauster of enthusiasm was contagious.
meanings.sent5: The exhauster of time never stops ticking.

meanings.definition: A machine or device used to remove air, gas, or liquid from a confined space.
meanings.sent1: The exhauster in the factory kept the air clean.
meanings.sent2: The exhauster in the lab prevented any leaks.
meanings.sent3: The exhauster in the kitchen sucked up all the smells.
meanings.sent4: The exhauster in the car made the ride smoother.
meanings.sent5: The exhauster in the basement hummed softly at night.
